text:
DJ Snake Snapped In Mumbai As He Arrives In India For The Biggest Holi Bash Ever!
DJ Snake Snapped In Mumbai As He Arrives In India For The Biggest Holi Bash Ever!
For Mumbaikars, this Holi is going to be a grand one as they are going to witness an experience of a lifetime. For the uninitiated, there is a big holi bash that is going to take place and to make it grander than ever, DJ Snake has already arrived in Mumbai.
Twitter
DJ Snake will be attending the Sunburn Arena Holi event at MMRDA Grounds in BKC. DJ Snake's Taki Taki was a big hit last year and this time again, the audience will get a first hand experience of it all at the Holi.
He was papped by the photographers in Mumbai.
Apart from him, there are 9 other artists who would be performing and this includes Ananya Birla, Omen and Ali Merchant among others.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES

DJ Snake's Taki Taki was a big hit last year and this time again, the audience will get a first hand experience of it all at the Holi.
